name: headscarf
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the head covering that some Muslim women wear when they are outside their home, or with people that they do not know well: She was wearing a traditional Muslim headscarf. A headscarf is seen by many Muslim women as a way to express their faith and avoid unwanted sexual attention. See also
hijab
Kelvin Murray/Stone/GettyImages
a square piece of material worn on the head, often folded into a triangle and tied under the chin or behind the head: His headscarf was a little flashy and macho. Queen Elizabeth was photographed trudging through the Scottish rain, her silk headscarf knotted under her chin.
FatCamera/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesLike other female students, she wears a headscarf and long, loose-fitting clothes.Make sure you get the correct Fifties style - dark glasses and perhaps a silk headscarf. Wearing a knotted headscarf, he epitomised the Latin male's delight in strutting his stuff.
